name: Avocado Prawns
author: dollychiaa
summary: Avocado is mashed until it turns into a paste with lemon juice and pepper. Absolutely original, it is a fantastic combination.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon chopped Italian flat leaf parsley
½ pound peeled and deveined prawns
1 pinch ground black pepper, to taste
directions: Mash the avocados, lemon zest, lemon juice, sugar, and parsley together in a bowl
Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium-low heat; cook the garlic in the hot oil until slightly browned, about 5 minutes
Add the prawns and increase heat to medium
Cook and stir the prawns over medium heat until they begin to change color
Stir the avocado mixture into the prawns; cook until the avocado is completely heated, about 2 minutes
Garnish with a little bit of black pepper to serve
